content.content: Hey good people, We have just made https://ethreport.info live - it contains the data from over 100 interviews conducted with some of the best known developers working in and around Ethereum currently. There are tonnes of cool ideas/issues/frustrations/opportunities in there for you to dig into, and it should be pretty easy to do that with the functionality on the site. You can read more about future plans here: https://medium.com/@cryptowanderer/the-ethprize-report-2018-831de9a9280f
content.GPT-summary: The post announces the release of ETHReport 2018, which contains data from over 100 interviews with Ethereum developers. The author invites readers to explore the site and mentions future plans. A third party gives entirely positive feedback on the proposal and extends to it by encouraging readers to check it out.
